description: This source file is a command-line interface (CLI) script for a 'Universal Project Initializer' tool. It processes CLI arguments, creates project configurations, interacts with templates, and initializes projects accordingly. The file provides command-line argument parsing, functions to convert parameters and template info to dictionaries, and a main function that orchestrates the project setup process.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] parse_parameters(params_str: str)
methods.description: Parses a string of comma-separated key=value pairs into a dictionary with appropriate data types.

methods.name: ProjectConfig create_project_config(args)
methods.description: Constructs a ProjectConfig object from command-line arguments.

methods.name: str make_path_absolute(path: str, base_path: Path)
methods.description: Joins a relative path with a base Path to produce an absolute path as a string.

methods.name: dict template_init_info_to_dict(init_info: TemplateInitInfo, project_path: Path)
methods.description: Converts a TemplateInitInfo object to a dictionary suitable for JSON serialization, resolving relative paths to absolute.

methods.name: output_json(success: bool, message: str, template_info: TemplateInitInfo = None, project_path: Path = None)
methods.description: Outputs the result as a JSON-formatted string with a success flag, message, and optionally the template config.

methods.name: main()
methods.description: Entry point of the script; parses arguments, creates project configs, interacts with the template factory, and initializes the project, culminating in printing JSON output.
